name: Brent
yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v14.9 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Brent, Author at Scione.io</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost/scione/author/brent/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="profile" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Brent, Author at Scione.io" />
<meta property="og:url" content="http://localhost/scione/author/brent/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Scione.io" />
<meta property="og:image" content="https://0.gravatar.com/avatar/337a518c88ed6e39645eaa2c4b36789f?s=500&d=mm&r=g" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<script type="application/ld+json" class="yoast-schema-graph">{
	    "@context": "https://schema.org",
	    "@graph": [
	        {
	            "@type": "WebSite",
	            "@id": "http://localhost/scione/#website",
	            "url": "http://localhost/scione/",
	            "name": "Scione.io",
	            "description": "Just another WordPress site",
	            "potentialAction": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "SearchAction",
	                    "target": "http://localhost/scione/?s={search_term_string}",
	                    "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
	                }
	            ],
	            "inLanguage": "en-US"
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "ProfilePage",
	            "@id": "http://localhost/scione/author/brent/#webpage",
	            "url": "http://localhost/scione/author/brent/",
	            "name": "Brent, Author at Scione.io",
	            "isPartOf": {
	                "@id": "http://localhost/scione/#website"
	            },
	            "inLanguage": "en-US",
	            "potentialAction": [
	                {
	                    "@type": "ReadAction",
	                    "target": [
	                        "http://localhost/scione/author/brent/"
	                    ]
	                }
	            ]
	        },
	        {
	            "@type": "Person",
	            "@id": "http://localhost/scione/#/schema/person/3c60b5926d21c8780a0e6b0cca00593b",
	            "name": "Brent",
	            "image": {
	                "@type": "ImageObject",
	                "@id": "http://localhost/scione/#personlogo",
	                "inLanguage": "en-US",
	                "url": "http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/337a518c88ed6e39645eaa2c4b36789f?s=96&d=mm&r=g",
	                "caption": "Brent"
	            },
	            "mainEntityOfPage": {
	                "@id": "http://localhost/scione/author/brent/#webpage"
	            }
	        }
	    ]
	}</script>
<!-- / Yoast SEO plugin. -->
